name: Buster Booster Bus
description:
Take the driver's seat as Buster, the owner of the craziest buses in the city. 
Avoid obstacles, pick up passengers and earn fares when dropping them on the stops!

Crazy retro 80's endless runner featuring bus driving action, you can design your bus from more than 70 available parts, upgrade your bus, and warp to other dimensions with a special power called MACH. Different game modes are available for a variety of gameplay experiences.

Made by Golden Pie Studios

For Android and iOS. Created with Unreal Engine 4.

For this game I was lead game designer, worked all the level design, helped with team organization, localization and QA. Was assistant director and also did voice acting, specially for the video ads.

Please check it out and review it in the store, thanks!
